good faith.translation[0].definitions[0]: He proposed a second meeting as a sign of his good faith.
The woman who sold me the car claimed she had acted in good faith (=had not meant to deceive me).
good faith.translation[1].definitions[0]: when a person, country etc intends to be honest and sincere and does not intend to deceive anyone
A ceasefire was declared as a sign of good faith.
The company had acted in good faith.
